content: 11 of 14 part 4 end of foot and toe knit to the end of the sole this is the new start of the round position the toe measures 4 4 5 5 cm / 1 5 1 75 2 inches if you need extra length repeat rounds 95 - 102 as required round 103 work chart d round 103 k1 ssk k to last 3 sts k2tog k1 4 sts decreased round 104 work chart d round 104 k to end continue working chart d with decreases on the sole on odd numbered row as described for round 103 until you have completed round 122 124 126 you should now have 24 28 32 stitches break yarn leaving an 8 inch 20 cm tail and graft to close the toe catkitbob designs estuary032025v2 page 12 of 14 part 4 written instructions - work once on each round knit to the end of the sole this is the new start of the round position repeat rounds 95 - 102 for extra length if required the toe measures 4 4 5 5 cm / 1 5 1 75 2 inches round 95 k tbl p1 x 1 2 3 k tbl k2 p1 k tbl p1 1/1/1 lpt × 2 p2 1/1/1 lpt p1 × 2 k tbl p1 k2 k tbl p1 k tbl x 1 2 3 k32 36 40 64 68 72 sts rounds 96 - 98 k tbl p1 x 1 2 3 k tbl k2 p1 k tbl × 5 p2 k tbl p1 × 5 k2 k tbl p1 k tbl x 1 2 3 k32 36 40 round 99 k tbl p1 x 1 2 3 k tbl k2 p1 eyelet × 2 p1 k tbl p2 k tbl p1 eyelet × 2 p1 k2 k tbl p1 k tbl x 1 2 3 k32 36 40 rounds 100 - 102 k tbl p1 x 1 2 3 k tbl k2 p1 k tbl × 5 p2 k tbl p1 × 5 k2 k tbl p1 k tbl x 1 2 3 k32 36 40 the following instructions include toe decreases round 103 k tbl p1 x 1 2 3 k tbl ssk p1 1/1 lpt k tbl p1 × 2 1/1/1 lpt p2 1/1/1 lpt p1 k tbl × 2 1/1 repeat p1 k2tog k tbl p1 k tbl x 1 2 3 k1 ssk k26 30 34 k2tog k1 4 sts decreased round 104 k tbl p1 x 1 2 3 k tbl k2 p1 k tbl × 2 p1 k tbl × 3 p2 k tbl p1 × 3 k tbl × 2 p1 k2 k tbl p1 k tbl x 1 2 3 k to end round 105 k tbl p1 x 1 2 3 k tbl ssk k1 1/1 lpt p1 k tbl × 3 p2 k tbl p1 × 3 1/1 repeat k1 k2tog k tbl p1 k tbl x 1 2 3 k1 ssk k24 28 32
